1.0.0.name: wordpress/eazy-cf-catpcha
1.0.0.description:
Eazy CF Captcha adds a little mathematic exercise to your Comment Forms to prevent Bots from spamming your comments.

You can easily customize the label text for the captcha in the backend of Wordpress. Also you can change the (X)HTML Markup if you like.
